an10.68:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā naḷakapāne viharati palāsavane.
an10.68:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
an10.68:4.3: Atha kho bhagavā bahudeva rattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anuviloketvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi:
an10.68:5.2: Paṭibhātu taṃ, sāriputta, bhikkhūnaṃ dhammī kathā.
an10.68:5.5: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato paccassosi.
an10.68:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi pāde pādaṃ accādhāya sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasi karitvā.
an10.68:6.2: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an10.68:6.4: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
an10.68:7.1: “Yassa kassaci, āvuso, saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī natthi …
an10.68:7.9: appamādo natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.
an10.68:7.10: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, kāḷapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāyateva vaṇṇena hāyati maṇḍalena hāyati ābhāya hāyati ārohapariṇāhena;
an10.68:7.11: evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, yassa kassaci saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī natthi …
an10.68:7.19: appamādo natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.
an10.68:8.1: Yassa kassaci, āvuso, saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī atthi …
an10.68:8.9: appamādo atthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no parihāni.
an10.68:8.10: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, juṇhapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vaḍḍhateva vaṇṇena vaḍḍhati maṇḍalena vaḍḍhati ābhāya vaḍḍhati ārohapariṇāhena;
an10.68:8.11: evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, yassa kassaci saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu … pe …
an10.68:8.12: appamādo atthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no parihānī”ti.
